recipes.title: Cod Fajitas
recipes.rawRecipe:
Cod Fajitas (Gousto)

Ingredients: 2 cod fillets, 1 red pepper, 1 yellow pepper, 1 red onion, fajita spice mix, 4 tortillas, lime, sour cream, coriander

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 200Â°C
2. Slice peppers and onion into strips
3. Toss vegetables with oil and half the spice mix, roast 15 mins
4. Cut cod into chunks, season with remaining spice
5. Add cod to tray with veg, roast another 10-12 mins until fish flakes
6. Warm tortillas
7. Serve with lime wedges, sour cream and coriander

recipes.title: Quick Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.rawRecipe:
Quick Chicken Stir Fry

Ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 1 broccoli head, 1 red pepper, 2 garlic cloves, ginger, soy sauce, sesame oil, rice

Instructions:
1. Put rice on to cook (12-15 mins)
2. Slice chicken into strips
3. Cut broccoli into florets, slice pepper
4. Heat wok until smoking, add oil
5. Stir fry chicken 3-4 mins until golden
6. Add vegetables, stir fry 2-3 mins
7. Add garlic, ginger, soy sauce
8. Toss everything together, serve over rice
